readability-simplify-subscript-expr.description:
Description

This check simplifies subscript expressions. Currently this covers calling
.data()
and immediately doing an array subscript operation to obtain a
single element, in which case simply calling
operator[]
suffice.

Examples:

std
::
string
s
=
...;
char
c
=
s
.
data
()[
i
];
// char c = s[i];
readability-simplify-subscript-expr.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

Options
Types
The list of type(s) that triggers this check. Default is
::std::basic_string;::std::basic_string_view;::std::vector;::std::array;::std::span
